channel.title: [Pi] Timer
channel.description: Hello everyone, I'm trying to add a custom Castle Wars interface and I have the interface where I want it, I just can't figure out how to add the timer and where it says: Zamorak Players: #. I think I need to use Cycle Events but I'm not sure how to add it, also I don't know how to place the text in the right position. Help would be appreciated! Thanks!

item.title: [Pi] Timer

item.description:

Hello everyone, I’m trying to add a custom Castle Wars interface and I have the interface where I want it, I just can’t figure out how to add the timer and where it says: Zamorak Players: #.
